text.text: Welcome to Blockbench 4.3 - The Start Screen Update!

features.title: Improved Start Screen
features.text: Formats are now organized into categories, and provide detailed descriptions. Also, recent models can be pinned as favorites!

features.title: Preview Scenes
features.text: Preview your model in a different environment. Check out how it looks in a Minecraft biome, or in a studio setting!
